newsonedescription: My KONAMI (https://my.konami.net) will be undergoing maitenence between 18:00 - 22:00 (UTC) on 19/10/2020.
newstwodescription: In this event, you'll be able to take the reins of one of four PES partner clubs.
newsthreedescription: From now until the online service stars, a "pre-open" period will be available to play.
newsfourdescription: The latest update to PES 2021 mobile (v.5.0.0) was released on 10/15/2020.
newsfivedescription: Scout Auctions will be unavailable for a short time.
